data.text:
In Loving Memory of Shelley Carol Jackson

Shelley Carol Jackson, 58, of Douglasville, Georgia, passed away on September 10, 2023. She was born on October 18, 1964, in Atlanta, Georgia. Shelley was a beloved sister, daughter, aunt and friend, and her loss leaves a void in the hearts of all who knew her.

Visitation will take place on September 14-15th 2023, at the church, providing an opportunity for friends and loved ones to pay their respects.

The funeral service for Shelley Carol Jackson will be held on Saturday, September 16, 2023, at 2:00 pm at Friendship Baptist Church, Cabbagetown, Atlanta.

Following the funeral service, Shelley will be laid to rest in the Almon Baptist Church Cemetery, located at 122 Almon Road, Covington, GA 30014.

Shelley brought light and laughter into the lives of those around her. Her memory will forever remain in our hearts, and she will be remembered for her kindness, generosity, and unwavering dedication.
